name: Slumbering Knight
description:
Slumbering Knight is a little puzzle game about a knight who keeps falling asleep all the time. You have to slide rows of tiles around to clear the path, so he can reach his beloved princess.

Warning:

You might find the princess to be a bit too rude. Don't hold it against her. She's a lovely girl really.

Controls:

Just the mouse.

Music:

Midnight Tale by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4710-midnight-tale
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Folk Round by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3770-folk-round
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
